p: Dresel and coworkers [ 127] determined human recognition threshold concentrations and the lowest of a total 11 bitter tastants from the hop hard resin fraction was awarded to co-multifidol glucopyranoside at a concentration as low as 5 Î¼mol/L. All in all, even minor hop compounds may be significant carriers of taste, not only from the soft resin, but also from the hard resin hop fraction [ 127].
